review: Love this product.  You can get Netflix and many more online (paid) services.  The main reason I bought this was to be able to watch sporting events on my iPad that are not available anywhere else and project the image from my iPad wirelessly to my TV via the Apple TV connection.  It works much better than viewing things via the laptop and connecting the laptop via HDMI to your TV.
